wikipedia_page.main: Professor John Dixon Mollon DSc FRS. (born September 12, 1944) is a British scientist. He is a leading researcher in visual neuroscience. His work has been cited over 15,000 times.

response: *John Mollon, Professor of Visual Neuroscience since 1998 at the University of Cambridge
